revised_title: Automatic Registration of Magnetometers and Meteorological Instruments via Photography
tldr: Charles Brooke describes an apparatus for registering the variation of thermometers and psychrometers on a single sheet of photographic paper. The paper also discusses improvements to the adjustment of lamps and the use of naphthalized gas and oil lamps for photographic registration. A new method for determining the scale and temperature coefficients of force magnetometers is presented, which may provide greater accuracy than previous methods.
